sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:40:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. 2. Add crushed coriander seeds and cumin seeds, cook until fragrant. 3. Add minced garlic, minced ginger, and chopped green chili. Cook until fragrant. 4. Add finely chopped onion and cook until translucent. 5. Stir in grated carrot and boiled peas. Cook for a few. 6. Add mashed potatoes, garam masala, turmeric powder, lemon juice, chopped fresh coriander, salt, and pepper. Mix well. 7. Allow the filling to cool. 8. Place a spoonful of the filling on a spring roll wrapper. Fold into a triangular shape and seal the edges with water. 9. Deep fry samosas until golden brown and crispy. 10. Serve hot with mint chutney or tamarind chutney.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Indian">8f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afcf</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients/> <meal_type display_value="Appetizer">91508fd39755021069a3b6fce053af8b</meal_type> <name>Samosa</name> <nutrition>Calories: 200, Protein: 5g, Fat: 10g, Carbs: 25g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Boil and mash potatoes. 2. Boil peas. 3. Grate carrot. 4. Finely chop onion, garlic, ginger, and green chili.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:30:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:56:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4e5917d797d5021069a3b6fce053afd5</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
